definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither
scattered/loose/to come loose/to fall apart/leisurely/powdered medicine
to scatter/to break up (a meeting etc)/to disperse/to disseminate/to dispel/(coll.) to sack

sentences.english: The stipulation of ongoing law is a little fragmentary and omits some necessary provisions.
sentences.chinese: 现行法律的规定略嫌零散，而且存在着盲区。

sentences.english: I jotted down stray thoughts and memories in the middle of the night.
sentences.chinese: 我将午夜无眠时零散的思绪和记忆随手记下。

sentences.english: Dingee heard the firing becoming more sporadic.
sentences.chinese: 迪丹吉听到枪声变得越来越零散。

sentences.english: Does having information scattered and cluttered around you inspire you to work?
sentences.chinese: 你从周围获取的零散信息激励你工作了么？

sentences.english: Our fractured landscape for energy governance was not planned.
sentences.chinese: 我们并没有对能源管理进行规划，都是零散的。

sentences.english: Though unsystematic, Lin Huiyin's fiction theory is of great modernity.
sentences.chinese: 林徽因的小说理论虽然零散，却十分具有现代性。

sentences.english: The people on the streetcar and scattered passersby worked to free the woman.
sentences.chinese: 电车上的人和零散的路人奋力把那个女人解救出来。

sentences.english: Much of the seabed is covered by marine mud with some scattered sand banks.
sentences.chinese: 大部分海床都为海泥和零散的沙洲所覆盖。

sentences.english: The restraining barrier is more steady than the interbed in vertical .
sentences.chinese: 纵向上隔层分布稳定，夹层分布零散。

sentences.english: But the ancient Chinese synonyms research is weak in dribs and drabs.
sentences.chinese: 但是，目前古代汉语同义词的研究还比较零散和薄弱。

sentences.english: The second part was the collection of scattered Tantric teachings.
sentences.chinese: 第二个部份则是零散密法的总汇。

sentences.english: People arrived at the party in dribs and drabs .
sentences.chinese: 人们零零散散地来到聚会上。

sentences.english: Colorful gingerbread houses like this one are scattered throughout Port-au-Prince.
sentences.chinese: 这些色彩艳丽的房子零零散散的分布在太子港。

sentences.english: Chunking consists of grouping separate bits of information.
sentences.chinese: 每块记忆材料是由一些零散孤立的信息所组成的。

sentences.english: Firms gathered data slowly and patchily, through mechanisms not built for the purpose.
sentences.chinese: 企业从非专属渠道缓慢而零散的收集数据。

sentences.english: Google has pieces of it, and wants more.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌只有零零散散一些，并希望拥有更多。

definition: disordered and in a mess (idiom); all mixed up and chaotic
an assortment/a bit of everything/lots of different (skills)
to break up the whole into pieces (idiom); dealing with things one by one/divide and conquer
